Package Managers

Class shoppingCart

java.lang.Object
Managers.shoppingCart
public class shoppingCart extends Object
The shoppingCart class represents a shopping cart for a user that can add, remove, and modify items. It contains methods to display the cart, increase and decrease item quantities, add and remove items, clear the cart, and checkout the order. It also stores the total price of the items in the cart.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    HashMap<Item,Integer>
    cart
    A HashMap to store the items in the cart and their corresponding quantities.
    double
    totalPrice
    The total price of all the items in the cart.

      Parameters:

      less - the quantity to remove from the cart
